feed.title: Gravity Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Gravity: Release 0.25.0
entry.content:
Upgrade to this version of gravity by using this container image:

ghcr.io/beryju/gravity:v0.25.0

Upgrade to the current JS API Client using

npm i gravity-api@0.25.0

Upgrade to the current Golang API Client using

go get beryju.io/gravity@v0.25.0

What's Changed

  • dhcp: suggest next free IP when creating lease in web UI by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1436
  • build(deps): bump @fsegurai/codemirror-theme-vscode-dark from 6.1.1 to 6.1.2 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1438
  • build(deps): bump the eslint group in /web with 2 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1437
  • build(deps): bump @fsegurai/codemirror-theme-vscode-light from 6.1.1 to 6.1.2 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1439
  • docs: enable dark/light mode by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1441
  • docs: add/update docs for migrating by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1440
  • build(deps): bump google.golang.org/protobuf from 1.36.2 to 1.36.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1444
  • build(deps): bump docker/build-push-action from 6.11.0 to 6.12.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1443
  • storage: Add generic Watcher by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1442
  • web: fix IP Sorting by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1445

Full Changelog: https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/compare/v0.24.0...v0.25.0

entry.title: New release for Gravity: Release 0.26.0
entry.content:
Upgrade to this version of gravity by using this container image:

ghcr.io/beryju/gravity:v0.26.0

Upgrade to the current JS API Client using

npm i gravity-api@0.26.0

Upgrade to the current Golang API Client using

go get beryju.io/gravity@v0.26.0

What's Changed

  • tests: add initial e2e tests by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1446
  • tests: add e2e tests for Cluster by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1447
  • build(deps): bump golang.org/x/sys from 0.0.0-20190412213103-97732733099d to 0.1.0 in /utils/pcap_to_bytes by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1448
  • tests: even more tests by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1449
  • tests: test dns middleware by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1451
  • discovery: use interface CIDR for auto-generated subnet, tests by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1452
  • tests: cover bench by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1453
  • dhcp: test WOL by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1454

Full Changelog: https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/compare/v0.25.0...v0.26.0

entry.title: New release for Gravity: Release 0.26.5
entry.content:
Upgrade to this version of gravity by using this container image:

ghcr.io/beryju/gravity:v0.26.5

Upgrade to the current JS API Client using

npm i gravity-api@0.26.5

Upgrade to the current Golang API Client using

go get beryju.io/gravity@v0.26.5

What's Changed

  • dhcp: delete leases of a scope when the scope is deleted by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1500
  • web: fix empty IP address causing sorting to fail by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1501
  • web: fix dns table chart with multiple nodes by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1502

Full Changelog: https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/compare/v0.26.4...v0.26.5
